First Year.description: Required yearly QPI to be promoted to Sophomore year

Sophomore.description: Required yearly QPI to be promoted to Junior year

Junior.description: Required yearly QPI to be promoted to Senior year

requirements: Complete all course requirements for degree program
Meet minimum yearly QPI for Senior/5th Year
Not serving a penalty of suspension or expulsion
Free from all financial and property accountabilities

separation.condition: Students who do not meet the QPI requirement for their year level shall be separated from Ateneo College
separation.no_diploma: Seniors/5th Year students who do not meet the required QPI for graduation shall not be entitled to a diploma

probation.description: Students who do not meet QPI requirement may be granted probation upon recommendation of Standards Committee
probation.how_to_apply: Write a letter of appeal to the Standards Committee through the Office of the AVP for Undergraduate Education
probation.limit: Students may be granted probation only once during their entire stay in Ateneo College
restrictions: Cannot officially represent the school in academic activities
Cannot represent in co-curricular or extracurricular activities
Cannot participate in inter-collegiate competitions, workshops, and conferences

yearly_qpi_definition: QPI computed on the basis of all grades earned during a school year (First Semester, Second Semester, and previous Intersession)
source: Ateneo College Student Handbook Vol 1, 2025 Edition, Sections 9-12
